title: 10/28/2021 DPS Hour 2 Bob Nightengale
itunes:title: 10/28/2021 DPS Hour 2 Bob Nightengale
description:
Jason and Mike preview tonight’s matchup between the Packers and the Cardinals, and take a look at what’s next in the Deshaun Watson saga, with the NFL trade deadline looming. USA Today MLB columnist and insider Bob Nightengale joins the show with all the latest out of the World Series between the Braves and the Astros, why Sam Darnold is proving he’s just a guy in Carolina, and Tua Tagovailoa explains how he feels about the Dolphins and the Deshaun Watson trade rumors.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
